6D Labs / CQ Extended Tag Library

CQ Extended Tag Library

CQ Extended Taglibs is a library of tag and Expression Language functions for the Adobe CQ5 platform. These tags expose commonly used methods and utilities as JSP Tags and EL Functions.

Why do I need this?

CQ Extended Taglibs allow developers to write cleaner and less error-prone CQ5 components by enabling them to use the power and flexibility of Sling and CQ5 with Tags and EL Functions.

How do I use the tags?

All of the tags use the cqex namespace. For more information on the available tags and functions and how to utilize them, please consult the documentation page.
